mapper.select: SELECT di. NAME FROM devops_ingress di, ( SELECT * FROM devops_ingress_path dip WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} ) r WHERE di.id = r.ingress_id GROUP BY di. NAME

SELECT DISTINCT di.id id, di.project_id projectId, di.env_id envId, di.`name` name, di.`domain` domain, di.is_usable isUsable, de.`name` envName, de.namespace namespace, cmd.`status` commandStatus, cmd.command_type commandType, cmd.error error FROM devops_ingress di JOIN devops_ingress_path dip ON dip.ingress_id = di.id JOIN devops_env de on de.id = di.env_id JOIN devops_env_command cmd ON cmd.object_id = di.id JOIN ( SELECT max( decmd.id ) id FROM devops_env_command decmd WHERE decmd.object = "service" GROUP BY decmd.object, decmd.object_id ) mcmd ON mcmd.id = cmd.id LEFT JOIN devops_service ds on ds.id = dip.service_id WHERE di.project_id = #{projectId}
AND
di.domain LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
di.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
de.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{envName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
de.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{envCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
dip.path LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{path, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
ds.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{serviceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
di.id = #{ingressId}
AND
di.env_id = #{envId}
AND
ds.id = #{serviceId}
AND (di.domain LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR di.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR de.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR de.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR dip.path LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR ds.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))
